boardgame.name: Fiese Freunde Fette Feten
Foute Vrienden Vette Feesten
Funny Friends
最佳損友
boardgame.description: Each player plays a character who starts the game as a teenager and then must choose the cards that will make his life take shape. He can repeat a school year and get new friends, start smoking, take part in a Bible discussion group and have his first sexual intercourse during Oktoberfest _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; all very realistic. Every event in the life of a character has some effect on his main characteristics - tobacco addiction, alcohol addiction, drug addiction, wealth, health, sadness, spirituality and wisdom. Excess comes at a price, though, and when a characteristic gets too high, it cancels another one _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; if you smoke too much, you get thin; if you get too fat, you must stop drinking; if you drink too much you lose your wisdom, and so on _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; once more, very realistic. During game, you can get friends, and often more, with other player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s characters. This is an important feature in the game, since what happens to you usually affects, in good or bad, your friends, and this is one of the main interaction aspects of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Description from Bruno Faidutti's ideal game library._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2006 Golden Geek Best Light / Party Game Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

FFFF, original German edition with English pasteups on the cards. The pasteups are what I would term serviceable, if not perfect. They do not detract from the game experience, and rather, add to it by making the humour in the cards more evident. The cards also come sleeved, which is necessary to prevent the pasteups from having their corners peel. The price on this item is slightly higher than a new in shrink copy because of the amount of work I had to put in to make this copy an english one. You pay true shipping costs, and have the option of either Parcel Post or Priority Mail from the USPS. Payment options are Paypal (preferred), Cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Check/Money Order, or cash (at your risk). I will ship anywhere in the world, the quoted price is only for the Continental United States. Yes, I combine shipping costs, so be sure to check out the other games I have available!

Brand new and factory sealed! Gamers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Inn is a real store in Mesa AZ, and will ship via DHL Ground or the USPS. Most games will ship for $7.50 unless it is particularly light or heavy, or if you request Priority or special handling. Insurance is available on all orders for about $2. About us: We can be reached at: info@gamersinnaz.com The store is open 24/7/365 and can be phoned at: 480-507-0509 Street address: 1232 E Southern Ave, Mesa, AZ 85204 You can check out our history as a Power Seller on eBay at: http://myworld.ebay.com/gamers_inn or on Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/gp/shops/index.html/104-7806078-3093525?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;sellerID=A2M6J42JR1XQD Our home page: http://www.gamersinnaz.com

Rio Grande Games (RIO 057) FUNNY FRIENDS *MATURE* What are your life goals? Are you willing to do what it takes to achieve them? In this game, fate select your goals, and changes them arbitrarily, so that after spending much time and effort to become a rock star, for example, fate decides you must now renounce that life and make the necessary life-style changes to become a, for example, a priest. Once you are pious and priestly, fate is likely to find another goal, which requires yet more significant changes in your life. This is a fun and fast-moving game that will leave you exhausted from the laughter and chaos!
Opened and Played once, Otherwise perfect condition.

Still in the shrink in and in great shape (I see no wear at all). The game looks like a hoot, but would not fit in with my game group at all. Shipping will be $14 if inside the continental U.S.. If you are outside the continental U.S., I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m willing to ship it to you, but the shipping cost will be whatever it costs me plus $3. (regular and Junior), Name Burst, Neopets TCG, Od, Origins of World War II, Partyzone “Spy Ring”, Phase 10, Phlounder, Pirates (the constructible strategy game), Ploy, Power Lunch, Rack-O, Razzle, Read My Lips (Kid!), Red Empire, Rook, Rummy-Cue, Scan, Seafarers 5-6 Player Expansion, Serauqs, Settlers of Catan Card Game, Shogun (James Clavell’s), Skip-Bo, Solarquest, Space Shuttle, Stage II, Stellar Wars, Stock Market Game (AH – 1970), Stratego (1962 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 1970), Survival (double game with the Barbarian), Talk Show, Tennis, The Millionaire Game (for Glen Oak High School), Time War, Time’s Up, Trailer Park Gods, Tripoley: Criss Cross Poker, True Colors, Tumblin Dice Timberrr Junior, Twistgammon, Twixt, United Nations, Web of Gold, World of Wall Street and Zobmondo!!.

Shipping will be ($15 to U.S. only) This game is actually like-new and played once.. 100% complete from a smoke-free home. The only reason I listed it as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; condition is because one of the corners on the box lid is separated. The game is otherwise perfect. Each player plays a character who starts the game as a teenager and then must choose the cards that will make his life take shape. He can repeat a school year and get new friends, start smoking, take part in a Bible discussion group and have his first sexual intercourse during Oktoberfest – all very realistic/so not rated for all ages! Every event in the life of a character has some effect on his main characteristics - tobacco addiction, alcohol addiction, drug addiction, wealth, health, sadness, spirituality and wisdom. Excess comes at a price, though, and when a characteristic gets too high, it cancels another one – if you smoke too much, you get thin; if you get too fat, you must stop drinking; if you drink too much you lose your wisdom, and so on – once more, very realistic. During game, you can get friends, and often more, with other player’s characters. This is an important feature in the game, since what happens to you usually affects, in good or bad, your friends, and this is one of the main interaction aspects of the game.
Very good condition, only one crease at a boxtop cover, and some normal shelfware. Components in perfect condition and complete.
